content: the purls - thumb round 6 7 knit the knits and purl the purls - small/medium bobble tightly weave in ends - small/medium bobble tightly weave in ends - large thumb round 8 knit the knits and purl the purls - large thumb round 8 knit the knits and purl the purls - large bobble tightly weave in ends - large bobble tightly weave in ends standard knitting abbreviations cast on = co repeat = repeat knit = k purl = p stitch = st needle 1 2 3 = n1 n2 n3 purl 2 together = p2tog bind off = bobble place marker = pm slip marker = slm purl front & back = pfb cable needle = cn left cross cable = lc right cross cable = rc right purl cross cable = rpc left purl cross cable = lpc llllaaaasssstttt rrrreeeevvvviiiissssiiiioooonnnn ddddeeeecccceeeemmmmbbbbeeeerrrr 5555 2222000011110000 vvvv 1111 4444 page 5 of 6 fire & ice fingerless mitts by roz marcotte chart symbol key ○ knit ● purl ■ no stitch ▼ purl front & back pfb >>>> 4-st rc sl 2 st to cn and hold to back k2 k2 from cn <<<< 4-st lc sl 2 st to cn and hold to front k2 k2 from cn ≥≥≥≥ 4-st rpc sl 2 st to cn and hold to back k2 p2 from cn ≤≤≤≤ 4-st lpc sl 2 st to cn and hold to front p2 k2 from cn ## rt/lt round *note round 57 does not require any pfb increases - all needed stitches are already there 16 st between markers left mitt cable chart right mitt cable chart ● ● ● ● ● ● ○ ○ ○ ○ ● ● ● ● ● ● 56 100 ● ● ● ● ● ● ○ ○ ○ ○ ● ● ● ● ● ● 56 100 ● ● ● ● ● ● > > > > ● ● ● ● ● ● 55 99 ● ● ● ● ● ● < < < < ● ● ● ● ● ● 55 99 ● ● ● ● ● ● ○ ○ ○ ○ ● ● ● ● ● ● 54 98 ● ● ● ● ● ● ○ ○ ○ ○ ● ● ● ● ● ● 54 98 ● ● ● ● ≥ ≥ ≥ ≥ ≤ ≤ ≤ ≤ ● ● ● ● 53 97 ● ● ● ● ≥ ≥ ≥ ≥ ≤ ≤ ≤ ≤ ● ● ● ● 53 97 ● ● ● ● ○ ○ ● ● ● ● ○ ○ ● ● ● ● 52 96 ● ● ● ● ○ ○ ● ● ● ● ○ ○ ● ● ● ● 52 96 ● ● ≥ ≥ ≥ ≥ ● ● ● ● ≤ ≤ ≤ ≤ ● ● 51 95 ● ● ≥ ≥ ≥ ≥ ● ● ● ● ≤ ≤ ≤ ≤ ● ● 51 95 ● ● ○ ○ ○ ○ ● ● ● ● ○
